crew

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • crew.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Ship class has a name, shield level and weapon.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship(java.lang.String name)
      default constructor sets the ship's name.
      Ship(java.lang.String name, int maxShieldLevel)
      extended constructor sets the ship's name and max shield level.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      decreases the ship's maximum shield level.
      int getMaxShieldLevel()
      returns the max shield level of the ship.
      java.lang.String getName()
      returns the name of the ship.
      int getShieldLevel()
      returns the shield level of the ship.
      ShipWeaponItem getWeapon()
      returns the ship's current weapon.

      increases the ship's maximum shield level.
      void increaseShield(int amount)
      increases the ship's shield level.
      ShipWeaponItem setWeapon(ShipWeaponItem weapon)
      sets the ship's current weapon.
      void takeDamage(int damage)
      reduces the ship's shield level.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        reduces the ship's shield level.
        Parameters:
        damage - positive amount of damage to take

      • increaseShield

        public void increaseShield(int amount)
        increases the ship's shield level.
        Parameters:
        amount - positive amount by which to repair the shield

      • increaseMaxShield

        public void increaseMaxShield(int amount)
        increases the ship's maximum shield level. increases current shield level by the same amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - positive amount by which to increase the max shield

      • decreaseMaxShield

        public void decreaseMaxShield(int amount)
        decreases the ship's maximum shield level.
        Parameters:
        amount - positive amount by which to decrease the max shield

      • setWeapon

        public ShipWeaponItem setWeapon(ShipWeaponItem weapon)
        sets the ship's current weapon. Returns the old weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - non null new weapon to set as the ship's weapon
        Returns:
        the previous weapon assigned to the ship

      • getWeapon

        public ShipWeaponItem getWeapon()
        returns the ship's current weapon.
        Returns:
        the ship's currently assigned ShipWeaponItem, null if none exists
